text: Rafael Durán Martínez (born 20 August 1997) is a Mexican footballer who plays as an attacking midfielder for Tigres UANL. ==Club career== ===Tigres UANL=== He would make his professional debut during an Apertura 2017 Copa MX group stage match against Cruz Azul, coming in as a substitute at the 61st minute. The game tied 1–1. He would score his first goal with Tigres on 21 October 2018 in a league match against Club Universidad Nacional, scoring turning the score in favor of Tigres 2–1 but eventually tying 3–3. ==Honours== ===Club=== ;Tigres UANL * Campeones Cup (1): 2018 ==References== ==External links== *Rafael Durán at Official Liga MX Profile *Rafael Durán at Soccerway Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Mexican footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Tigres UANL footballers Category:Sportspeople from Guadalajara, Jalisco Category:Footballers from Jalisco
title: Rafael Durán Martínez
